content.description: This ambitious concept started life as a pop-up, before taking up brick-and-mortar residence. The ground floor—where patrons are greeted amidst splashes of blue and white—gives way to a moody, monochromatic, and swanky upstairs. The impressive menu pays homage to Chef/owner Rodney Wages' experiences at some of the city’s most ...
content.name: Avery
